title: Books about japanese typography
content: I have read many of your threads about Chinese/Japanese typography and i found really useful hits and answers for my questions. But there is one thing i really would like to know. Are there any good books about "learning typography" for the asian area (especiall japanese one) in english. Because there are really good ones for the latin alphabet and i would like to learn more about this subject and delve into it. Any recommendations ? Thanks a lot in advance.
author: flynn
